name: @services/dunning-service
description: Dunning service for managing billing issues and payment recovery

scripts.package: mkdir -p dist/handler/api-gateway && esbuild src/handler/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/handler/index.js && esbuild src/handler/api-gateway/handler.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/handler/api-gateway/handler.js && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip handler/ && cd ..
